description:
The head of the research department at Yagiri Pharmaceuticals. Because of family issues she develops an interest in her brother Seiji and later tries to get rid of Selty`s head after her brother falls in love with it. She also persuades Mika into a plastic surgery to replace her deformed face with that of Selty`s and later attempts to erase her memory.
Following Mika`s escape she and her followers are defeated by Mikado and the Dollars, whom Mika turned to. And Namie, left without any other choice, starts working under Izaya.
name: Yagiri Namie
